content: a tiny fish pattern time for some tiny fish why i love this pattern you can make plenty of them in under an hour you can teach colors to kids or how to count you can use them as favors to parties or as tiny surprise gifts to your loved ones ❤️ have i mentioned that they need only a bit yarn to be made yes this too oh there is no sewing pieces together too it is the perfect beginner pattern to learn how in increase and decrease enjoy and don t forget to use the hashtag #wanderingdeer and tag me @wanderingdeer so i can see your amazing creations f is for fish part of the alphabet amigurumi collection
